text: He mominaharu! Timi allahako maddata garne bha'ihala jasto ki isa bina mariyamale havariharusita bhaneka thi'eh ki ko cha jasale allahako batoma mero sahayata garnecha? Havariharule bhaneh ki hami allahako batoma maddatadine haum ta bani isra'ilamadhye e'uta samuhale ta imana lyayo ra e'uta samuha kaphira rahyo. Antatah hamile imanavalaharula'i uniharuko satruharuko mukabilama maddata garyaum ta uniharula'i varcasva prapta bha'ihalyo
